column1: Bavette's Bar & Boeuf////They were also very
column2: very friendly concerning my gluten free needs.  Sometimes
column3: places make me feel bad about asking about what items are gf. (Which seriously offends me btw
column4: I didn't choose to have celiac disease).  The waiter
column5: Daniel was amazing about it and would even tell me when there was malt on an item.  Most places think it is just wheat
column6: but he even knew about the malt and barely side of gluten as well.  Props to our waiter.
